verses.verse: And the child <S%H5288><s%> SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> ministered <S%H8334><s%> <S%H8764><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eli <S%H5941><s%>. And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was precious <S%H3368><s%> in those days <S%H3117><s%>; there was no open <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8737><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%>.

And it came to pass at that time <S%H3117><s%>, when Eli <S%H5941><s%> was laid down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in his place <S%H4725><s%>, and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> began <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to wax dim <S%H3544><s%>, that he could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%>;

And ere the Menorah <S%H5216><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> went out <S%H3518><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, where the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> was, and SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> was laid down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to sleep;
That the YY <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>: and he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Here am I.

And he ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Eli <S%H5941><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Here am I <S%H2009><s%>; for thou calledst <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not; lie down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8798><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>. And he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and lay down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> yet again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>. And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Eli <S%H5941><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Here am I; for thou didst call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me. And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not, my son <S%H1121><s%>; lie down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8798><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>.

Now SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> did not yet <S%H2962><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, neither was the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> yet revealed <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto him.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the third time <S%H7992><s%>. And he arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Eli <S%H5941><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Here am I; for thou didst call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me. And Eli <S%H5941><s%> perceived <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> had called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the child <S%H5288><s%>.

Therefore Eli <S%H5941><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, lie down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: and it shall be, if he call <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, that thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%>, YY <S%H3068><s%>; for thy servant <S%H5650><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%>. So SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and lay down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his place <S%H4725><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and stood <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as at other times <S%H6471><s%>, SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>. Then SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%>; for thy servant <S%H5650><s%> heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, Behold, I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> a thing <S%H1697><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, at which both <S%H8147><s%> the ears <S%H241><s%> of every one that heareth <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8802><s%> it shall tingle <S%H6750><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> I will perform <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> against Eli <S%H5941><s%> all things which I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%>: when I begin <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, I will also make an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

For I have told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him that I will judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his house <S%H1004><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%> for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> which he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; because his sons <S%H1121><s%> made themselves vile <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, and he restrained <S%H3543><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them not.

And therefore I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eli <S%H5941><s%>, that the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Eli's <S%H5941><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall not be purged <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8691><s%> with sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> nor offering <S%H4503><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> lay <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> until the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>. And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8687><s%> Eli <S%H5941><s%> the vision <S%H4759><s%>.

Then Eli <S%H5941><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%>. And he answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Here am I.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What is the thing <S%H1697><s%> that the YY hath said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto thee? I pray thee hide <S%H3582><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it not from me: 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> do so <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to thee, and more also <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, if thou hide <S%H3582><s%> <S%H8762><s%> any thing <S%H1697><s%> from me of all the things <S%H1697><s%> that he said <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto thee.

And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him every whit <S%H1697><s%>, and hid <S%H3582><s%> <S%H8765><s%> nothing from him. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is the YY <S%H3068><s%>: let him do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what seemeth <S%H5869><s%> him good <S%H2896><s%>.

And SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> was with him, and did let none of his words <S%H1697><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8689><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from Dan <S%H1835><s%> even to Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> was established <S%H539><s%> <S%H8737><s%> to be a prophet <S%H5030><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8736><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>: for the YY <S%H3068><s%> revealed <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8738><s%> himself to SH'mu'el <S%H8050><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> by the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
